name: BRadioButtonGroup
sample: <BRadioButtonGroup name='BOA RadioButton Group' labelPosition='left' defaultSelected='not_light' style={styles.block} onChange={myCheckEvent()} />

infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: Should be used to pass RadioButton components.

infoArray.name: className
infoArray.desc: The CSS class name of the root element.

infoArray.name: defaultSelected
infoArray.desc: The value property of the radio button that will be selected by default. This takes precedence over the checked property of the RadioButton elements.

infoArray.name: labelPosition
infoArray.desc: Where the label will be placed for all child radio buttons. This takes precedence over the labelPosition property of the RadioButton elements.

infoArray.name: name
infoArray.desc: The name that will be applied to all child radio buttons.

infoArray.name: style
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the root element.

infoArray.name: valueSelected
infoArray.desc: The value of the currently selected radio button.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: Callback function that is fired when a radio button has been checked.
